info.author: Sebastien Ramage
info.description:
py4d is a little wrapper using ctypes around 4dopen.dll that allow python
communicate with 4th Dimension ACI database server (http://www.4d.com). Actually
it has been make for 4d 6.5.4 server using 4dopen.dll 6.0.6 Maybe it can work
with other 4dopen version. It requires the 4dopen.dll and work only on Windows

it also has a builtin xmlrpc server to expose function to the rest of the world
(so you can call it from linux ;) ) and a sample code to use the xmlrpc server
as windows service.
info.name: py4d
info.html_description:
py4d is a little wrapper using ctypes around 4dopen.dll that allow python communicate with 4th Dimension ACI database server (http://www.4d.com). Actually it has been make for 4d 6.5.4 server using 4dopen.dll 6.0.6 Maybe it can work with other 4dopen version. It requires the 4dopen.dll and work only on Windows

it also has a builtin xmlrpc server to expose function to the rest of the world (so you can call it from linux ;) ) and a sample code to use the xmlrpc server as windows service.
